summary:
Script Type: P2PKH (Pay-to-Public-Key-Hash)

This is a Pay-to-Public-Key-Hash script. It requires a signature and public key that hashes to the embedded 20-byte hash. Most common script type for Bitcoin addresses starting with '1'.


Initial Stack (Symbolic): [<signature>, <public_key>]
This stack is preloaded to represent data pushed by the unlocking script (scriptSig) in real Bitcoin execution.
